script.name: plugin.oldplot.unistate
script.sourceplaintext:
if $a.state == 'reunion' set global variable: name='plot.unistate' value='reunion' deactivate job: id=5001
else if $a.state == 'setupterran' activate job: id=5001 if not get global variable: name='oldplot.terran' set global variable: name='plot.unistate' value='tc' set global variable: name='oldplot.terran' value=[TRUE]
$need.patching = [FALSE] $aldrin2 = get sector from universe index: x=16, y=0 skip if $aldrin2 -> exists $need.patching = [TRUE]
set Kha'ak aggression level to 100
* allow jumping to Aldrin $sub.sector = get sector from universe index: x=16, y=1 do if $sub.sector -> exists $sub.sector -> set sector always jumpable: [TRUE]
if $need.patching * remove inactive gate in ocean of fantasy $of = get sector from universe index: x=19, y=5 if $of -> exists $sub.sector = $of gosub sub.ClearSpecial end
* Remove inactive gate in zyarths dominion $zd = get sector from universe index: x=20, y=6 if $zd -> exists $sub.sector = $zd gosub sub.ClearSpecial end
* remove the goner temple $eol = get sector from universe index: x=14, y=7 if $eol -> exists $temple = find station: sector=$eol class or type=Goner Temple race=Goner flags=null refobj=null maxdist=null maxnum=100 refpos=null if $temple -> exists $temple ->disable ship rebuild $temple ->destruct: show no explosion=[TRUE] end end
* tears of greed, remove inactive gate $tog = get sector from universe index: x=21, y=9 if $tog -> exists $sub.sector = $tog gosub sub.ClearSpecial end
* remove torus wreck $earth = get sector from universe index: x=16, y=3 do if $earth -> exists $earth ->clear sector objects
* Convert back to unknown sector (Enduring Light) $us = get sector from universe index: x=12, y=4 if $us -> exists $us ->set owner race to Other $us ->set sector text id: 1020000 $us ->set sector description id: 1034070 $sub.sector = $us gosub sub.ClearShips end
* remove inactive gate, Nathans Voyage $nv = get sector from universe index: x=15, y=9 if $nv -> exists $sub.sector = $nv gosub sub.ClearSpecial end
load universe map: 'x3_universe_terranplot'
$sub.sector = get sector from universe index: x=14, y=9 if $sub.sector -> exists $sub.sector ->set owner race to Other $sub.sector ->set sector text id: 1020000 $sub.sector ->set sector description id: 1034070 end end
set plot flag: 4096, on=[TRUE]
* start the Torus Defence system $earth = get sector from universe index: x=16, y=3 if $earth -> exists $docks = $earth -> get dock array from sector if $docks $i = size of array $docks while $i dec $i = $d = $docks[$i] $range = get global parameter value: parameter='SG_MAX_DISTANCE_COMM' default=25000 if $range < 100000 $d ->set override comm range: 100000 end $d ->set station safe position on active: value=[FALSE] end end @ START [THIS] -> call script !config.earth.torus : end end
else if $a.state == 'patch1' $of = get sector from universe index: x=19, y=5 if $of -> exists $sub.sector = $of gosub sub.ClearSpecial end
else if $a.state == 'startterran' * enable terran jobs set plot flag: [PlotFlg.Terran], on=[TRUE]
else if $a.state == 'clearwrecks' $sub.sector = get sector from universe index: x=13, y=4 gosub sub.ClearWrecks
else if $a.state == 'linkaldrin' load universe map: 'x3_universe_aldrinlink'
else if $a.state == 'bop' load universe map: 'x3_universe_bop'
else if $a.state == 'linkaldrinxenon' load universe map: 'x3_universe_aldrinxenonlink'
else if $a.state == 'linkterran' set dynamic notoriety: race=Terran, on=[FALSE] set dynamic notoriety: race=ATF, on=[FALSE] remove linked notoriety: race=Terran, unlinked=ATF
* set relations for terran @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.oldplot.notorierty : Game='fl' @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.oldplot.notorierty : Game='tc'
set global variable: name='oldplot.terran.link' value=[TRUE] $ab = get sector from universe index: x=12, y=3 if $ab -> exists $gate = $ab -> get warp gate: gate id=1 do if $gate -> exists $gate ->destruct: show no explosion=[TRUE] $sub.sector = $ab gosub sub.ClearSpecial end
$he = get sector from universe index: x=13, y=4 if $he -> exists $he ->set owner race to Terran $gate = $he -> get warp gate: gate id=0 do if $gate -> exists $gate ->destruct: show no explosion=[TRUE] $sub.sector = $he gosub sub.ClearWrecks gosub sub.ClearStations gosub sub.ClearShips gosub sub.ClearSpecial end
load universe map: 'x3_universe_terranlink'
$sub.sector = get sector from universe index: x=13, y=4 gosub sub.PreventCollisionMove
else if $a.state == 'apstart' load universe map: 'x3_universe_aldrinlink' load universe map: 'x3_universe_apstart'
else if $a.state == 'ap' if not get global variable: name='oldplot.ap' set global variable: name='oldplot.ap' value=[TRUE] set global variable: name='plot.unistate' value='ap'
add linked notoriety: race=Terran, linked=ATF set dynamic notoriety: race=Terran, on=[TRUE] set dynamic notoriety: race=ATF, on=[TRUE]
$earth = get sector from universe index: x=16, y=3 if $earth -> exists $sub.sector = $earth gosub sub.ClearWrecks gosub sub.ClearStations gosub sub.ClearSpecial end
$sub.sector = get sector from universe index: x=19, y=6 if $sub.sector -> exists $gate = $sub.sector -> get north warp gate if $gate -> exists $dest.gate = $gate -> get gate destination: return sector=[FALSE] $gate ->destruct: show no explosion=[TRUE] do if $dest.gate -> exists $dest.gate ->destruct: show no explosion=[TRUE] end end
$sub.sector = get sector from universe index: x=12, y=4 if $sub.sector -> exists $sub.sector ->set owner race to Pirates $sub.sector ->set sector text id: 1020613 $sub.sector ->set sector description id: 1030613 end
$sub.sector = get sector from universe index: x=18, y=9 if $sub.sector -> exists $gate = $sub.sector -> get north warp gate if not $gate -> exists gosub sub.ClearSpecial
$sub.sector = get sector from universe index: x=13, y=7 do if $sub.sector -> exists gosub sub.ClearStations $sub.sector = get sector from universe index: x=14, y=8 do if $sub.sector -> exists gosub sub.ClearStations $sub.sector = get sector from universe index: x=14, y=7 do if $sub.sector -> exists gosub sub.ClearFactories $sub.sector = get sector from universe index: x=13, y=5 do if $sub.sector -> exists gosub sub.ClearStations $sub.sector = get sector from universe index: x=13, y=4 do if $sub.sector -> exists gosub sub.ClearStations $sub.sector = get sector from universe index: x=12, y=2 do if $sub.sector -> exists gosub sub.ClearStations $sub.sector = get sector from universe index: x=12, y=3 do if $sub.sector -> exists gosub sub.ClearStations
load universe map: 'x3_universe_ap' end end
set plot flag: 8192, on=[TRUE]
@ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.oldplot.notorierty : Game='fl' @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.oldplot.notorierty : Game='ap' end
else if $a.state == 'finalfury' $sub.sector = get sector from universe index: x=14, y=9 if $sub.sector -> exists $sub.sector ->set owner race to Argon $sub.sector ->set sector text id: 1020815 $sub.sector ->set sector description id: 1030815 end
else if $a.state == 'restore' set dynamic notoriety: race=ATF, on=[TRUE] set dynamic notoriety: race=Terran, on=[TRUE] add linked notoriety: race=Terran, linked=ATF @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.oldplot.notorierty : Game='fl' end
return null
* =============================== sub.ClearShips: if $sub.sector -> exists $sub.array = $sub.sector -> get ship array from sector/ship/station gosub sub.ClearArray end endsub
sub.ClearStations: if $sub.sector -> exists $sub.array = $sub.sector -> get station array from sector gosub sub.ClearArray end endsub
sub.ClearFactories: if $sub.sector -> exists $sub.array = $sub.sector -> get factory array from sector gosub sub.ClearArray end endsub
sub.ClearSpecial: if $sub.sector -> exists $sub.array = $sub.sector ->get sector custom objects gosub sub.ClearArray end endsub
sub.ClearWrecks: if $sub.sector -> exists $sub.array = $sub.sector ->get wreck array gosub sub.ClearArray $sub.sector -> clear all wrecks end endsub
sub.ClearArray: if $sub.array $undock.delay = [FALSE]
$sub.i = size of array $sub.array while $sub.i dec $sub.i = $sub.obj = $sub.array[$sub.i] $sub.owner = $sub.obj -> get owner race if not $sub.owner -> is player race if $sub.obj -> is of class Station $docked = $sub.obj -> get ship array from sector/ship/station $docked.i = size of array $docked while $docked.i dec $docked.i = $sub.docked = $docked[$docked.i] $sub.owner = $sub.docked -> get owner race if $sub.owner -> is player race @ START $sub.docked -> call script !move.undock : $undock.delay = [TRUE] end end end end
do if $undock.delay @ = wait 10 ms
$sub.i = size of array $sub.array while $sub.i dec $sub.i = $sub.obj = $sub.array[$sub.i] do if $sub.obj -> is of class Station $sub.obj ->disable ship rebuild $sub.obj ->destruct: show no explosion=[TRUE] end end
end endsub
sub.PreventCollisionMove: if $sub.sector -> exists $docks = $sub.sector -> get dock array from sector if $docks $i = size of array $docks while $i dec $i = $d = $docks[$i] $d ->set station safe position on active: value=[FALSE] end end end endsub return null
